channel.title: Migrate to Site Bay on Site Bay Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Migrate to Site Bay on Site Bay Tutorials

item.title: How to Migrate a WordPress.com Website to Site Bay
item.description: This tutorial describes how to export your content from WordPress.com and host your WordPress website on Site Bay.

item.title: Best Practices when Migrating to Site Bay
item.description: Next StepsAfter doing the above, your site should be fully migrated to Site Bay. It is a good idea to wait a few days before cancelling your previous WordPress hosting service to make sure that everything is running smoothly.

item.title: How to Migrate a LAMP Website to Site Bay
item.description: This tutorial describes how to migrate a website running in a LAMP environment on another host to Site Bay.
